alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 01 at 3:06PM CDT until August 02 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM CDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS, LOW HUMIDITY, AND HOT TEMPERATURES FOR SOUTH CENTRAL OKLAHOMA... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds, low humidity, and hot temperatures, which is in effect from noon to 9 PM CDT Wednesday. * TIMING...12 pm to 9 pm. * WINDS...South 10 to 15 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 19 percent. * TEMPERATURES...105 to 108 degrees. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.
